thread.title: 30. Kaunertal Opening 2015 – Overall Recap

title: 30. Kaunertal Opening 2015 – Overall Recap
text: Submit 30. Kaunertal Opening 2015 – Overall Recap This is how an anniversary has to go down! Even the most amazing events have to end sometime - and so did the 30th edition show more of the Snowpark Kaunertal Opening. The anniversary party was one of it´s kind. Three blue bird days and phenomenal snow conditions framed the KTO in an outstanding manner. Thousands of happy and stoked Freeskiers and Snowboarders enjoyed a surreal weekend at the Kaunertal Glacier inclusively a perfect shaped Snowpark spread on 4 different locations and setups. Vibes from 30 years of KTO history where combined and spread on this weekend. The influence the Snowpark Opening had on the development of the scene was once again shown and lived by all people how took part at the event. A mix of tradition and innovation formed the program. The latest gear of the upcoming season was shown at the huge Blue Tomato Testival, where everybody had the chance to find and test his or her potential dream equipment for free on all opening days. Next to the Testival area lots of side events and sessions went down.
